title: Forever & Ever: A Collection of Stories
description: A Faith, Love, & Devotion Anthology  What happens after the story ends?  Join Matt, Evan, Jim, Griffin, and their friends and families for a glimpse of what happens after happily ever after. Between growing up and growing pains, weddings and retirement, changing careers and changing diapers, life is never boring. Changes, decisions, tears, and joy await as the years march on.
author: Tere Michaels
